verses.verse: <S%G2532><s%> I saw, <S%G1492><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> Mount <S%G3735><s%> Zion, <S%G4622><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> him <S%G846><s%> a number, <S%G1540><s%> one hundred forty <S%G5062><s%> - four <S%G5064><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> his <S%G846><s%> name, <S%G3686><s%> and the name of his Father, <S%G3962><s%> written <S%G1125><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> their <S%G846><s%> foreheads. <S%G3359><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> a sound <S%G5456><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven, <S%G3772><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> the sound <S%G5456><s%> of many <S%G4183><s%> waters, <S%G5204><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> like <S%G5613><s%> the sound <S%G5456><s%> of a great <S%G3173><s%> thunder. <S%G1027><s%> <S%G2532><s%> The sound <S%G5456><s%> which I heard <S%G191><s%> was like that of harpists <S%G2790><s%> playing <S%G2789><s%> on <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> harps. <S%G2788><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> They sing <S%G103><s%> <S%G5613><s%> a new <S%G2537><s%> song <S%G5603><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the throne, <S%G2362><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> before <S%G1799><s%> the four <S%G5064><s%> living creatures <S%G2226><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the elders. <S%G4245><s%> <S%G2532><s%> No one <S%G3762><s%> could <S%G1410><s%> learn <S%G3129><s%> the <S%G1487><s%> song <S%G5603><s%> except <S%G3361><s%> the one hundred <S%G1540><s%> forty <S%G5062><s%> - four <S%G5064><s%> thousand, <S%G5505><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> had been redeemed <S%G59><s%> out <S%G575><s%> of the earth. <S%G1093><s%>

These <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> those who <S%G3739><s%> were <S%G3435><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> defiled <S%G3435><s%> with <S%G3326><s%> women, <S%G1135><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> virgins. <S%G3933><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> the Lamb <S%G721><s%> wherever <S%G3699><s%> <S%G99999><s%> he goes. <S%G5217><s%> These <S%G3778><s%> were redeemed <S%G59><s%> by Jesus from <S%G575><s%> among men, <S%G444><s%> the first fruits <S%G536><s%> to God <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to the Lamb. <S%G721><s%>
<S%G2532><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> mouth <S%G4750><s%> was found <S%G2147><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> lie, <S%G1388><s%> for <S%G1063><s%> they are <S%G1526><s%> blameless. <S%G299><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> I saw <S%G1492><s%> an <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> flying <S%G4072><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> mid heaven, <S%G3321><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> an eternal <S%G166><s%> Good News <S%G2098><s%> to proclaim <S%G2097><s%> to those who dwell <S%G2730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> to every <S%G3956><s%> nation, <S%G1484><s%> <S%G2532><s%> tribe, <S%G5443><s%> <S%G2532><s%> language, <S%G1100><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> people. <S%G2992><s%>

He said <S%G3004><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> "Fear <S%G5399><s%> the Lord, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> give <S%G1325><s%> him <S%G846><s%> glory; <S%G1391><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> judgment <S%G2920><s%> has come. <S%G2064><s%> <S%G2532><s%> Worship <S%G4352><s%> him <S%G3588><s%> who made <S%G4160><s%> the heaven, <S%G3772><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> <S%G2532><s%> the sea, <S%G2532><s%> and <S%G2281><s%> the springs <S%G4077><s%> of waters! <S%G5204><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> Another, <S%G243><s%> a second angel, <S%G32><s%> followed, <S%G190><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Babylon <S%G897><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> has fallen, <S%G4098><s%> <S%G4098><s%> which <S%G3754><s%> has made <S%G4222><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> the nations <S%G1484><s%> to drink <S%G4222><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the wine <S%G3631><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of her <S%G846><s%> sexual immorality. <S%G4202><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> Another angel, <S%G32><s%> a third, <S%G5154><s%> followed <S%G190><s%> them, <S%G846><s%> saying <S%G3004><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a great <S%G3173><s%> voice, <S%G5456><s%> "If <S%G1487><s%> anyone <S%G5100><s%> worships <S%G4352><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> image, <S%G1504><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> receives <S%G2983><s%> a mark <S%G5480><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> forehead, <S%G3359><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand, <S%G5495><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> he <S%G846><s%> also will drink <S%G4095><s%> of <S%G1537><s%> the wine <S%G3631><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> is prepared <S%G2767><s%> unmixed <S%G194><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the cup <S%G4221><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> anger. <S%G3709><s%> <S%G2532><s%> He will be tormented <S%G928><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> fire <S%G4442><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> sulfur <S%G2303><s%> in the presence <S%G1799><s%> of the holy <S%G40><s%> angels, <S%G32><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in the presence of <S%G1799><s%> the Lamb. <S%G721><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The smoke <S%G2586><s%> of their <S%G846><s%> torment <S%G929><s%> goes up <S%G305><s%> <S%G1519><s%> forever <S%G165><s%> and ever. <S%G165><s%> <S%G2532><s%> They have <S%G2192><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> rest <S%G372><s%> day <S%G2250><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> night, <S%G3571><s%> those who <S%G3588><s%> worship <S%G4352><s%> the beast <S%G2342><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> his <S%G846><s%> image, <S%G1504><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> whoever <S%G1536><s%> receives <S%G2983><s%> the mark <S%G5480><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> name. <S%G3686><s%>

Here <S%G5602><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> the patience <S%G5281><s%> of the saints, <S%G40><s%> <S%G5602><s%> those who keep <S%G5083><s%> the commandments <S%G1785><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the faith <S%G4102><s%> of Jesus. <S%G2424><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I heard <S%G191><s%> the voice <S%G5456><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> heaven <S%G3772><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> <S%G3427><s%> "Write, <S%G1125><s%> <S%G3107><s%> 'Blessed are the dead <S%G3498><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> die <S%G599><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the Lord <S%G2962><s%> from now on. <S%G534><s%>'" "Yes, <S%G3483><s%>" says <S%G3004><s%> the Spirit, <S%G4151><s%> "that <S%G2443><s%> they may rest <S%G373><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> their <S%G846><s%> labors; <S%G2873><s%> for <S%G1161><s%> their <S%G846><s%> works <S%G2041><s%> follow <S%G190><s%> with them. <S%G3326><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> I looked, <S%G1492><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> a white <S%G3022><s%> cloud; <S%G3507><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the cloud <S%G3507><s%> one sitting <S%G2521><s%> like <S%G3664><s%> a son <S%G5207><s%> of man, <S%G444><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> his <S%G846><s%> head <S%G2776><s%> a golden <S%G5552><s%> crown, <S%G4735><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> his <S%G846><s%> hand <S%G5495><s%> a sharp <S%G3691><s%> sickle. <S%G1407><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out from <S%G1537><s%> the temple, <S%G3485><s%> crying <S%G2896><s%> with <S%G1722><s%> a loud <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G5456><s%> to him <S%G3588><s%> who sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the cloud, <S%G3507><s%> "Send forth <S%G3992><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> sickle, <S%G1407><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> reap; <S%G2325><s%> for <S%G3754><s%> the hour <S%G5610><s%> to reap <S%G2325><s%> has come; <S%G2064><s%> for the <S%G4671><s%> <S%G2325><s%> harvest <S%G2326><s%> of the earth <S%G1093><s%> is ripe! <S%G3583><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> He <S%G3588><s%> who sat <S%G2521><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the cloud <S%G3507><s%> thrust <S%G906><s%> his <S%G846><s%> sickle <S%G1407><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> the earth <S%G1093><s%> was reaped. <S%G2325><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out from <S%G1537><s%> the temple <S%G3485><s%> which is <S%G3588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> heaven. <S%G3772><s%> He <S%G846><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> had <S%G2192><s%> a sharp <S%G3691><s%> sickle. <S%G1407><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Another <S%G243><s%> angel <S%G32><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out from <S%G1537><s%> the altar, <S%G2379><s%> he who has <S%G2192><s%> power <S%G1849><s%> over <S%G1909><s%> fire, <S%G4442><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> he called <S%G5455><s%> with a great <S%G3173><s%> voice <S%G2906><s%> to him <S%G3588><s%> who had <S%G2192><s%> the sharp <S%G3691><s%> sickle, <S%G1407><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> "Send forth <S%G3992><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> sharp <S%G3691><s%> sickle, <S%G1407><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gather <S%G5166><s%> the clusters <S%G1009><s%> of the vine <S%G1093><s%> of the earth, <S%G3754><s%> for the earth <S%G846><s%>'s grapes <S%G4718><s%> are fully ripe! <S%G187><s%>"

<S%G2532><s%> The angel <S%G32><s%> thrust <S%G906><s%> his <S%G846><s%> sickle <S%G1407><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> gathered <S%G5166><s%> the vintage <S%G288><s%> of the earth, <S%G1093><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> threw <S%G906><s%> it into <S%G1519><s%> the great <S%G3173><s%> winepress <S%G3025><s%> of the wrath <S%G2372><s%> of God. <S%G2316><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> The winepress <S%G3025><s%> was trodden <S%G3961><s%> outside <S%G1854><s%> of the city, <S%G4172><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> blood <S%G129><s%> came <S%G1831><s%> out from <S%G1537><s%> the winepress, <S%G3025><s%> even to <S%G891><s%> the bridles <S%G5469><s%> of the horses, <S%G2462><s%> as far as <S%G575><s%> one thousand <S%G5507><s%> six hundred <S%G1812><s%> stadia. <S%G4712><s%>
